org.svvrl.goal.core.logic
Interface FormulaRewriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ACTLSimplifier, EH2000, EH2000, LTLPastEvaluator, LTLPastFutureSeparator, LTLSimplifier, ORESimplifier, QPTLPastEvaluator, QPTLPastFutureSeparator, QPTLSimplifier, RESimplifier
public interface FormulaRewriter

A FormulaRewriter can rewrite a formula into a simpler one.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Summary
 boolean isApplicable(Logic formula)
          Returns true if the specified formula is supported by this rewriter.
 Logic rewrite(Logic formula)
          Rewrites the specified formula.

              throws UnsupportedException

Throws:
